description: '''Popcorn''' is a subgenre of [[dance music]] that originated in [[Romania]] in the late [[2000s in music|2000s]]. It is inspired by [[Europop]] and [[dance-pop]], featuring [[house music|house]] and [[Trance music|trance]] rhythms and fast [[tempo]]s. The arrangement is characterized by the use of [[Syncopation|syncopated]] [[synthesizer]]s played in [[staccato]], and [[Brass instrument|brass]]. Instruments such as [[accordion]]s were eventually also included in several popcorn songs, which were most commonly performed in English.
